text: "After the Love Has Gone" is a 1979 song by Earth, Wind & Fire. It is the second single from their ninth studio album I Am (1979). It went to number 2 in the United States, number 4 in the United Kingdom and number 8 in Ireland and New Zealand. It went on to win 2 Grammy Awards in 1980. title: After the Love Has Gone
